alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 4:23PM PST until December 08 at 11:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches through 11 PM Thursday. Storm total accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Ephrata, Quincy, Othello, and Moses Lake. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely be slick. The wintry conditions will impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
